snippet: Mr. Lindsey introduced the character of Goober — the quintessential grinning hayseed, equal parts annoying and endearing — on “The Andy Griffith Show.”
abstract: George Lindsey, actor and comedian best known as character Goober Pyle on three television series, dies at age 83.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Lindsey introduced the character of Goober — the quintessential grinning hayseed, equal parts annoying and endearing — on “The Andy Griffith Show.”

headline.seo: George Lindsey, TV’s Goober Pyle, Dies at 83
headline.main: George Lindsey, TV’s Goober Pyle, Dies at 83
headline.print_headline: George Lindsey, a k a Goober, Dies at 83
